actors: [('Jimmy "The Tulip" Tudeski', 'Bruce Willis'), ('Nicholas "Oz" Oseransky', 'Matthew Perry'), ('Sophie Oseransky', 'Rosanna Arquette')]
synopsis: A mobster named Jimmy the Tulip agrees to cooperate with an FBI investigation in order to stay out of prison; he's relocated by the authorities to a life of suburban anonymity as part of a witness protection program. It's not long before a couple of his new neighbors figure out his true identity and come knocking to see if he'd be up for one more hit, suburban style.

title: Beautiful People
actors: [('Portia Thornton', 'Charlotte Coleman'), ('George Thornton', 'Charles Kay'), ('Nora Thornton', 'Rosalind Ayres')]
synopsis: In London, during October 1993, England is playing Holland in the preliminaries of the World Cup. The Bosnian War is at its height, and refugees from the ex-Yugoslavia are arriving. Football rivals, and political adversaries from the Balkans all precipitate conflict and amusing situations. Meanwhile, the lives of four English families are affected in different ways by encounter with the refugees.

title: Black Tar Heroin: The Dark End of the Street
synopsis: The film follows a simple structure, and shows the drug-related degradation of five youths (Jake, Tracey, Jessica, Alice, Oreo) during the course of three years. The film depicts drug-related crimes and diseases: prostitution, male prostitution, AIDS, and lethal overdoses.

title: Blue Collar
actors: [('Zeke Brown', 'Richard Pryor'), ('Jerry Bartowski', 'Harvey Keitel'), ('Smokey James', 'Yaphet Kotto')]
synopsis: Fed up with mistreatment at the hands of both management and union brass, and coupled with financial hardships on each man's end, three auto assembly line workers hatch a plan to rob a safe at union headquarters.

title: Bluebeard
actors: [('Gaston Morrell', 'John Carradine'), ('Lucille', 'Jean Parker'), ('Inspector Lefevre', 'Nils Asther')]
synopsis: Young female models are being strangled inexplicably. Will law enforcement be able to stop the crime wave before more women become victims?

title: Circus, The
actors: [('A Tramp', 'Charlie Chaplin'), ('The Circus Proprietor and Ring Master (as Allan Garcia)', 'Al Ernest Garcia'), ('His Step-daughter, A Circus Rider', 'Merna Kennedy')]
synopsis: Charlie, a wandering tramp, becomes a circus handyman and falls in love with the circus owner's daughter. Unaware of Charlie's affection, the girl falls in love with a handsome young performer. Charlie's versatility makes him star of the show when he substitutes for an ailing tightwire walker. He is discharged from the company when he protects the girl from her father's abuse, but he returns and appeals to the handsome performer to marry the girl. After the wedding the father prevails upon them to rejoin the circus. Charlie is hired again, but he stays behind when the caravan moves on.

title: City Lights
actors: [('Tramp', 'Charlie Chaplin'), ('A Blind Girl', 'Virginia Cherrill'), ("The Blind Girl's Grandmother", 'Florence Lee')]
synopsis: City Lights is the first silent film that Charlie Chaplin directed after he established himself with sound accompanied films. The film is about a penniless man who falls in love with a flower girl. The film was a great success and today is deemed a cult classic.

title: Flamingo Kid, The
actors: [('Jeffrey Willis', 'Matt Dillon'), ('Arthur Willis', 'Héctor Elizondo'), ('Ruth Willis', 'Molly McCarthy')]
synopsis: Brooklyn teenager Jeffrey Willis, thoroughly unhappy with his modest homestead, embraces the other-world aspects of his summer job at the posh Flamingo Club. He spurns his father in favor of the patronage of smooth-talking Phil Brody and is seduced by the ample bikini charms of club member Carla Samson. But thanks to a couple of late-summer hard lessons, the teen eventually realizes that family should always come first.

title: Dog's Life, A
actors: [('Tramp', 'Charlie Chaplin'), ('Bar Singer', 'Edna Purviance'), ('Bartender (uncredited)', 'Dave Anderson')]
synopsis: Poor Charlie lives in a vacant lot. He tries to get a job but when he gets to the head of the employment line the jobs are gone. Back "home" he rescues Scraps, a bitch being attacked by other strays. Together they manage to steal some sausages from a lunch wagon. They enter a dance hall where Edna is a singer and unwilling companion to the clientele. He is thrown out when he can't pay. Back "home"

title: Kid, The
actors: [('A Tramp', 'Charlie Chaplin'), ('The Kid', 'Jackie Coogan'), ('Mother', 'Edna Purviance')]
synopsis: Considered one of Charlie Chaplin's best films, The Kid also made a star of little Jackie Coogan, who plays a boy cared for by The Tramp when he's abandoned by his mother, Edna. Later, Edna has a change of heart and aches to be reunited with her son. When she finds him and wrests him from The Tramp, it makes for what turns out be one of the most heart-wrenching scenes ever included in a comedy.

title: Man from Laramie, The
actors: [('Will Lockhart', 'James Stewart'), ('Vic Hansbro', 'Arthur Kennedy'), ('Alec Waggoman', 'Donald Crisp')]
synopsis: Will Lockhart (James Stewart) becomes entangled in the happenings of Coronado, an isolated western town, after delivering supplies there. He is especially involved with the Waggomans, an influential ranching family, and begins his search for someone selling rifles to the local Apaches, only to find out it is the son of the most powerful man in the area. It is at this point that his troubles begin.

title: McCullochs, The
actors: [('J. J. McCulloch', 'Forrest Tucker'), ('Hannah McCulloch', 'Julie Adams'), ('Culver Robinson', 'Max Baer, Jr.')]
synopsis: A story about the rich McCulloch Family, their overbearing father and the children's misguided blaming him for everything that doesn't go right.

title: Class Reunion
actors: [('Bob Spinnaker', 'Gerrit Graham'), ('Dr. Robert Young', 'Michael Lerner'), ('Cindy Shears', 'Misty Rowe')]
synopsis: Lizzie Borden High's class of '72 are going through the motions at their tenth-year reunion, until deranged alum Walter Baylor, driven insane by a sadistic senior-year prank, escapes from the mental institution and crashes the party. When guests start getting bumped off, the other alumni, including snooty yacht salesman Bob Spinnaker, class tease Bunny Packard, and class zero Gary Nash, spring into action to uncover the culprit. Chuck Berry makes an onstage appearance.

title: Big Trees, The
actors: [('Jim Fallon', 'Kirk Douglas'), ('Alicia Chadwick', 'Eve Miller'), ('Daisy Fisher / Dora Figg', 'Patrice Wymore')]
synopsis: In 1900, unscrupulous timber baron Jim Fallon plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions off California redwood. Much of the land he hopes to grab has been homesteaded by a Quaker colony, who try to persuade him to spare the giant sequoias...but these are the very trees he wants most. Expert at manipulating others, Fallon finds that other sharks are at his own heels, and forms an unlikely alliance.

title: Happy Go Lovely
actors: [('B.G. Bruno', 'David Niven'), ('Janet Jones', 'Vera-Ellen'), ('John Frost', 'Cesar Romero')]
synopsis: B.G. Bruno, a rich bachelor, the head of a successful greeting-card company in Scotland, is essentially a kind man but respectable to the point of stodginess and extreme stuffiness. An American troupe visiting Edinburgh wants to produce a musical in town but has trouble getting backers. Bruno meets several of the leading ladies of the show; through a misunderstanding he doesn't correct they think that he's a newspaper reporter. He falls in love with one of the women, who reciprocates; he grows more lively and friendly, to the surprise of his employees. After a series of mishaps and comic incidents comes a happy ending: a successful show and true love.

title: Reindeer Games
actors: [('Rudy Duncan', 'Ben Affleck'), ('Gabriel Mercer', 'Gary Sinise'), ('Ashley Mercer', 'Charlize Theron')]
synopsis: After assuming his dead cellmate's identity to get with his girlfriend, an ex-con finds himself the reluctant participant in a casino heist.

title: Wonder Boys
actors: [('Prof. Grady Tripp', 'Michael Douglas'), ('James Leer', 'Tobey Maguire'), ('Dean Sara Gaskell', 'Frances McDormand')]
synopsis: Grady (Michael Douglas) is a 50-ish English professor who hasn't had a thing published in years -- not since he wrote his award winning "Great American Novel" 7 years ago. This weekend proves even worse than he could imagine as he finds himself reeling from one misadventure to another in the company of a new wonder boy author.

title: Deterrence
actors: [('Walter Emerson', 'Kevin Pollak'), ('Marshall Thompson', 'Timothy Hutton'), ('Gayle Redford', 'Sheryl Lee Ralph')]
synopsis: The President of the United States must deal with an international military crisis while confined to a Colorado diner during a freak snowstorm.

title: Judy Berlin
actors: [('Sue Berlin', 'Barbara Barrie'), ('Judy Berlin', 'Edie Falco'), ('Alice Gold', 'Madeline Kahn')]
synopsis: A dramatic comedy where a the relationship of a teacher and married principal goes much worse than that of their children.

title: Mifune (Mifunes sidste sang)
actors: [('Kresten', 'Anders W. Berthelsen'), ('Liva', 'Iben Hjejle'), ('Rud', 'Jesper Asholt')]
synopsis: Kresten, newly wed, is on the threshold of a great career success in his father-in-law´s company. But when the death of his own father takes him back to his poverty-stricken childhood home, far out in the country, his career plans fall apart. For one thing he has to deal with his loveable, backward brother, who is now all alone; for another, he meets a stunning woman who comes to the farm as a housekeeper, in disguise of her real profession as a call-girl.

title: Waiting Game, The
actors: [('', 'Will Arnett')]
synopsis: A group of aspiring young actors wait tables at a New York City restaurant.

title: 3 Strikes
actors: [('Rob Douglas', 'Brian Hooks'), ('Juanita Johnson', "N'Bushe Wright"), ('Tone', 'Faizon Love')]
synopsis: Brian Hooks plays a character who is just released from jail. And the state adopts a "3 strikes" rule for felons that involves serious penalties. Hooks has 2 strikes, and wants to change his life for the better. When a friend picks him up, they are pulled over, and his friend shoots at police officers, and Hooks escapes. Now Hooks, a wanted man, must clear his name of having nothing to do with the shooting.

title: Chain of Fools
actors: [('Kolko', 'Salma Hayek'), ('Avnet', 'Jeff Goldblum'), ('Mikey', 'Elijah Wood')]
synopsis: An avid detective is assigned to investigate the heist of a batch of precious coins that end up in the hands of a suicidal barber.

title: Drowning Mona
actors: [('Chief Wyatt Rash', 'Danny DeVito'), ('Mona Dearly', 'Bette Midler'), ('Ellen Rash', 'Neve Campbell')]
synopsis: The recently deceased Mona Dearly (Bette Midler) was many things: an abusive wife, a domineering mother, a loud-mouthed neighbor and a violent malcontent. So when her car and corpse are discovered in the Hudson River, police Chief Wyatt Rash (Danny DeVito) immediately suspects murder rather than an accident. But, since the whole community of Verplanck, N.Y., shares a deep hatred for this unceasingly spiteful woman, Rash finds his murder investigation overwhelmed with potential suspects.

title: Next Best Thing, The
actors: [('Abbie Reynolds', 'Madonna'), ('Robert Whittaker', 'Rupert Everett'), ('Ben Cooper', 'Benjamin Bratt')]
synopsis: A comedy-drama about best friends - one a straight woman, Abbie, the other a gay man, Robert - who decide to have a child together. Five years later, Abbie falls in love with a straight man and wants to move away with her and Robert's little boy Sam, and a nasty custody battle ensues.

title: What Planet Are You From?
actors: [('Harold Anderson', 'Garry Shandling'), ('Susan Anderson', 'Annette Bening'), ('Roland Jones', 'John Goodman')]
synopsis: A highly-evolved planet, whose denizens feel no emotion and reproduce by cloning, plans to take over Earth from the inside by sending an operative, fashioned with a humming, mechanical penis, to impregnate an earthling and stay until the birth. The alien, Harold Anderson, goes to Phoenix as a banker and sets to work finding a mate. His approaches to women are inept, and the humming phallus doesn't help, but on the advice of a banking colleague, he cruises an AA meeting, meets Susan, and somehow convinces her to marry. The clock starts to tick: will she conceive, have a baby, and lose Harold (and the child) to his planet before he discovers emotion and starts to care?

title: Beyond the Mat
actors: [('Himself', 'Mick Foley'), ('Himself', 'Terry Funk'), ('Himself', 'Vince McMahon')]
synopsis: Beyond the Mat is a 1999 professional wrestling documentary, directed by Barry W. Blaustein. The movie focuses on the lives of professional wrestlers outside of the ring, especially Mick Foley, Terry Funk, and Jake Roberts. The film heavily focuses on the World Wrestling Federation (WWF), often criticizing it and its chairman Vince McMahon. It also follows Extreme Championship Wrestling, it's rise in popularity, and many other independent wrestlers and organizations.

title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
actors: [('Ghost Dog', 'Forest Whitaker'), ('Sonny Valerio', 'Cliff Gorman'), ('Louise Vargo', 'Tricia Vessey')]
synopsis: An African-American Mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob.

title: Year My Voice Broke, The
actors: [('Danny Embling', 'Noah Taylor'), ('Freya Olsen', 'Loene Carmen'), ('Trevor Leishman', 'Ben Mendelsohn')]
synopsis: Coming-of age feature, set in a New South Wales country town in the 1960s, about a 15 year-old boy. It follows his loves and how he copes with life's problems such as death and departure.

title: Splendor in the Grass
actors: [("Wilma Dean 'Deanie' Loomis", 'Natalie Wood'), ("Arthur 'Bud' Stamper", 'Warren Beatty'), ('Ace Stamper', 'Pat Hingle')]
synopsis: A fragile Kansas girl's unrequited and forbidden love for a handsome young man from the town's most powerful family drives her to heartbreak and madness.

title: My Tutor
actors: [('Terry Green', 'Caren Kaye'), ('Bobby Chrystal', 'Matt Lattanzi'), ('Mr. Chrystal', 'Kevin McCarthy')]
synopsis: High school senior Bobby Chrystal fails his French class, which will block him from entering Yale. His rich, authoritarian father hires an attractive 29-year-old to tutor Bobby over the summer and help him pass a make-up exam. While Bobby's friends lead him away into strange excursions aimed at losing their virginity, Bobby finds all the extracurricular activities he needs with his new tutor.

title: Legend of Lobo, The
actors: [('Narrator', 'Rex Allen')]
synopsis: You'll be captivated as you track the legendary Lobo through an amazing Southwest adventure. Our story begins with Lobo as an adorable wolf cub and follows his growth into a fearless and majestic leader of the pack. At odds with the local cattlemen, the price on Lobo's head grows, attracting an expert wolf hunter. As they go head to head, Lobo's amazing survival instincts and family devotion leave the hunter with nothing but respect. With the rich narration of Rex Allen, and music from the legendary Sherman Brothers and the popular Sons Of The Pioneers, this is family entertainment at its best!

title: Killing of Sister George, The
actors: [("June 'George' Buckridge", 'Beryl Reid'), ("Alice 'Childie' McNaught", 'Susannah York'), ('Mercy Croft', 'Coral Browne')]
synopsis: When June Buckridge (Beryl Reid) arrives at her London flat and announces 'They are going to murder me', her long-time lover and doll-cuddling flat mate Alice 'Childie' McNaught (Susannah York) realises that things are going to change. For June is referring to her character 'Sister George', a lovable nurse she portrays in a popular daytime serial. To make matters worse, the widowed executive at the BBC responsible for the decision to kill off Sister George - Mercy Croft (Coral Browne) is also a predatory lesbian who is after Childie and will stop at nothing to get what she wants.

title: Key Largo
actors: [('Frank McCloud', 'Humphrey Bogart'), ('Johnny Rocco', 'Edward G. Robinson'), ('Nora Temple', 'Lauren Bacall')]
synopsis: A hurricane swells outside, but it's nothing compared to the storm within the hotel at Key Largo. There, sadistic mobster Johnny Rocco holes up - and holds at gunpoint hotel owner James Temple, his widowed daughter-in-law Nora, and ex-GI Frank McCloud.

title: Jail Bait
actors: [('Inspector John', 'Lyle Talbot'), ('Dr Boris Gregor', 'Herbert Rawlinson'), ('Lt Bob Lauwrence', 'Steve Reeves')]
synopsis: Don Gregor, the son of famous plastic surgeon Dr. Boris Gregor, begins to hang around with young criminal Vic Brady and carry a gun. The pair attempt an armed holdup, and when things start to go wrong Gregor accidentally kills a night watchman. Fearing that Gregor plans to turn himself in, Brady kills him and blackmails Dr. Gregor into giving him a new face.

title: It Happened Here
actors: [('Pauline', 'Pauline Murray'), ('Doctor Richard Fletcher', 'Sebastian Shaw'), ('Skipworth', 'Bart Allison')]
synopsis: It is the Second World War. The Nazis have invaded Britain. There is a split between the resistance and those who prefer to collaborate with the invaders for a quiet life. The protagonist, a nurse, is caught in the middle.

title: I'll Never Forget What's 'is Name
actors: [('Jonathan Lute', 'Orson Welles'), ('Andrew Quint', 'Oliver Reed'), ('Georgina Elben', 'Carol White')]
synopsis: Advertising golden boy Andrew Quint is fed up with his fabulously successful life. In very dramatic fashion, he quits his job to return to writing for a small literary magazine. He wants to leave his former life behind, going as far as saying good-bye to his wife and mistresses. He finds, however, that it's not so easy to escape the past.

title: For All Mankind
actors: [('Jim Lovell', 'Jim Lovell'), ('Russell Schweickart', 'Russell Schweickart'), ('Eugene Cernan', 'Eugene Cernan')]
synopsis: Directed by Al Reinert and with music scored by Brian Eno, "For All Mankind" provides a testament to NASA's Apollo program of the 1960s and '70s. Composed of actual NASA footage of the missions and astronaut interviews, the documentary offers the viewpoint of the individuals who braved the remarkable journey to the moon and back. While compiling the material for the film, Reinert went through more than six million feet of film of these historic moments.

title: Cross of Iron
actors: [('Unteroffizier / Feldwebel Rolf Steiner', 'James Coburn'), ('Hauptmann Stransky', 'Maximilian Schell'), ('Oberst Brandt', 'James Mason')]
synopsis: It is 1943, and the German army, ravaged and demoralised, are hastily retreating from the Russian front. In the midst of all this madness, conflict brews between the aristocratic yet ultimately pusillanimous Captain Stransky and the courageous Corporal Steiner. Stransky is the only man who believes that the Third Reich are still vastly superior to the Russian army; however within his pompous persona lies a quivering coward who longs for the Iron Cross so that he can return to Berlin a hero. Steiner, on the other hand is cynical, defiantly non-conformist and more concerned with the safety of his own men rather than the horde of military decorations offered to him by his superiors. Steiner's lack of respect results in a growing animosity between the two...

title: Bride of the Monster
actors: [('Dr. Eric Vornoff', 'Bela Lugosi'), ('Lt. Dick Craig', 'Tony McCoy'), ('Lobo', 'Tor Johnson')]
synopsis: Dr. Varnoff captures twelve men for his experiment: to turn them into supermen using atomic energy. Newspaperwoman Lawton gets too snoopy for her own good.

title: Born Yesterday
actors: [("Emma 'Billie' Dawn", 'Judy Holliday'), ('Harry Brock', 'Broderick Crawford'), ('Paul Verrall', 'William Holden')]
synopsis: Uncouth, loud-mouth junkyard tycoon Harry Brock descends upon Washington D.C. to buy himself a congressman or two, bringing with him his mistress, ex-showgirl Billie Dawn.

title: Birdy
actors: [('Birdy', 'Matthew Modine'), ('Sergeant Al Columbato', 'Nicolas Cage'), ('Doctor Major Weiss', 'John Harkins')]
synopsis: Two young men are seriously affected by the Vietnam war. One of them has always been obsessed with birds - but now believes he really is a bird, and has been sent to a mental hospital. Can his friend help him pull through?

title: And God Created Woman
actors: [('Robin Shea', 'Rebecca De Mornay'), ('Billy Moran', 'Vincent Spano'), ('James Tiernan', 'Frank Langella')]
synopsis: In this variation on director Vadim's own, more acclaimed Et Dieu Créa La Femme (1956, the same title in French), the vamp Robin Shea marries charming carpenter Billy Moran, only to get out of prison, but soon decides to seduce James Tiernan, who runs for state governor.

title: Blood Feast
actors: [('Detective Pete Thornton (as Thomas Wood)', 'William Kerwin'), ('Fuad Ramses', 'Mal Arnold'), ('Suzette Fremont', 'Connie Mason')]
synopsis: In the sleepy suburbs of Miami, seemingly normal Egyptian immigrant Fuad Ramses (Mal Arnold) runs a successful catering business. He also murders young women and plans to use their body parts to revive the goddess Ishtar. The insane Ramses hypnotizes a socialite in order to land a job catering a party for her debutante daughter, Suzette Fremont (Connie Mason), and turns the event into an evening of gruesome deaths, bloody dismemberment and ritual sacrifice.

title: Charlie, the Lonesome Cougar
actors: [('Jess Bradley', 'Ron Brown'), ('Potlatch', 'Bryan Russell'), ("Jess's Fiancé", 'Linda Wallace')]
synopsis: A heartwarming Disney classic in which a cougar, who was rescued as a cub and raised by a group of loggers in the Pacific Northwest, reverts back to his natural instincts, leading to hilarious (and dangerous) consequences.

title: Color Me Blood Red
actors: [('Adam Sorg', 'Gordon Oas-Heim'), ('April Carter', 'Candi Conder'), ('Gigi', 'Elyn Warner')]
synopsis: Gore specialist H.G. Lewis' gruesome tale of an artist who becomes a success after using human blood in his paintings.

title: Never Cry Wolf
actors: [('Farley Mowat', 'Charles Martin Smith'), ('Ootek', 'Zachary Ittimangnaq'), ('Mike', 'Samson Jorah')]
synopsis: This film dramatizes the true story of Farley Mowat, when he was sent to the Canadian tundra area to collect evidence of the grievous harm the wolf population was allegedly doing to the caribou herds. In his struggle to survive in that difficult environment he studies the wolves, and realizes that the old beliefs about wolves and their supposed threat are almost totally false. Furthermore, he learns that humans represent a far greater threat to the land, and also to the wolves, a species which plays an important role in the ecosystem of the north.

title: Night Visitor, The
actors: [('Salem', 'Max von Sydow'), ('The Inspector', 'Trevor Howard'), ('Ester Jenks', 'Liv Ullmann')]
synopsis: An insane Swedish farmer escapes from an asylum to get revenge on his sister, her husband and others.

title: Perils of Pauline, The
actors: [('Pearl White', 'Betty Hutton'), ('Michael Farrington', 'John Lund'), ('Mr. Timmy Timmons', 'Billy De Wolfe')]
synopsis: Funloving Pearl White, working in a garment sweatshop, gets her big chance when she "opens" for a delayed Shakespeare play...with a comic vaudeville performance. Her brief stage career leads her into those "horrible" moving pictures, where she comes to love the chaotic world of silent movies, becoming queen of the serials. But the consequences of movie stardom may be more than her leading man can take

title: Raisin in the Sun, A
actors: [('Walter Lee Younger', 'Sidney Poitier'), ('Lena Younger', 'Claudia McNeil'), ('Ruth Younger', 'Ruby Dee')]
synopsis: Walter Lee Younger is a young man struggling with his station in life. Sharing a tiny apartment with his wife, son, sister and mother, he seems like an imprisoned man. Until, that is, the family gets an unexpected financial windfall...

title: Two Thousand Maniacs!
actors: [('Terry Adams', 'Connie Mason'), ('Tom White', 'William Kerwin'), ('Mayor Buckman', 'Jeffrey Allen')]
synopsis: Six people are lured into a small Deep South town for a Centennial celebration where the residents proceed to kill them one by one as revenge for the town's destruction during the Civil War.

title: Brown's Requiem
actors: [('Fritz Brown', 'Michael Rooker'), ('Jane', 'Selma Blair'), ('Cathcart', 'Brion James')]
synopsis: Fritz Brown is an ex-LAPD, recovering alcoholic who now splits his time repossessing cars for a used car lot and staffing his one-man private detective agency. When a filthy caddie named Freddy "Fat Dog" Baker wanders into Fritz's office one day, flashing a wad of cash, Fritz is hired to follow Fat Dog's kid sister Jane, who is holed up with a Beverly Hills sugar daddy named Sol Kupferman. Kupferman is a 70 year-old bag man for the mob, and Fat Dog claims that "Solly K" is up to something evil that may harm Jane. The trail leads Fritz to an encounter with his dark past in the person of Haywood Cathcart, current head of LAPD internal affairs and the person who kicked Fritz off the police force.

title: Closer You Get, The
actors: [('', 'Ian Hart'), ('', 'Sean McGinley'), ('', 'Niamh Cusack')]
synopsis: Irish bachelors take out an ad in the Miami Herald, looking for love.

title: Mission to Mars
actors: [('Jim McConnell', 'Gary Sinise'), ("Woodrow 'Woody' Blake", 'Tim Robbins'), ('Luke Graham', 'Don Cheadle')]
synopsis: When contact is lost with the crew of the first Mars expedition, a rescue mission is launched to discover their fate.

title: Ninth Gate, The
actors: [('Dean Corso', 'Johnny Depp'), ('Boris Balkan', 'Frank Langella'), ('Liana Telfer', 'Lena Olin')]
synopsis: An all-expenses-paid international search for a rare copy of the book, 'The Nine Gates of the Shadow Kingdom' brings an unscrupulous book dealer deep into a world of murder, double-dealing and satanic worship.

title: Condo Painting
actors: [('Big Red', 'Patrick Achdjian'), ('', 'William S. Burroughs'), ('', 'Anna Condo')]
synopsis: No overview yet.

title: East-West (Est-ouest)
actors: [('Gabrielle Develay', 'Catherine Deneuve'), ('Marie', 'Sandrine Bonnaire'), ('Aleksei Golovin', 'Oleg Menshikov')]
synopsis: June 1946: Stalin invites Russian emigres to return to the motherland. It's a trap: when a ship-load from France arrives in Odessa, only a physician and his family are spared execution or prison. He and his French wife (her passport ripped up) are sent to Kiev. She wants to return to France immediately; he knows that they are captives and must watch every step.

title: Defending Your Life
actors: [('Daniel Miller', 'Albert Brooks'), ('Julia', 'Meryl Streep'), ('Bob Diamond', 'Rip Torn')]
synopsis: In an afterlife resembling the present-day US, people must prove their worth by showing in court how they have demonstrated courage.

title: Breaking Away
actors: [('Mike', 'Dennis Quaid'), ('Cyril', 'Daniel Stern'), ('Moocher', 'Jackie Earle Haley')]
synopsis: Dave, nineteen, has just graduated high school, with his 3 friends, The comical Cyril, the warm hearted but short-tempered Moocher, and the athletic, spiteful but good-hearted Mike. Now, Dave enjoys racing bikes and hopes to race the Italians one day, and even takes up the Italian culture, much to his friends and parents annoyance.

title: Hoosiers
actors: [('Coach Norman Dale', 'Gene Hackman'), ('Myra Fleener', 'Barbara Hershey'), ('Shooter', 'Dennis Hopper')]
synopsis: High school basketball is king in small-town Indiana, and the 1954 Hickory Huskers are all hope and no talent. But their new coach -- abrasive, unlikable Norman Dale -- whips the team into shape ... while also inciting controversy.

title: Bull Durham
actors: [('Crash Davis', 'Kevin Costner'), ('Annie Savoy', 'Susan Sarandon'), ("Ebby Calvin 'Nuke' LaLoosh", 'Tim Robbins')]
synopsis: Veteran catcher Crash Davis is brought to the minor league Durham Bulls to help their up and coming pitching prospect, "Nuke" Laloosh. Their relationship gets off to a rocky start and is further complicated when baseball groupie Annie Savoy sets her sights on the two men.

title: Dog Day Afternoon
actors: [('Sonny', 'Al Pacino'), ('Sal', 'John Cazale'), ('Det. Sgt. Eugene Moretti', 'Charles Durning')]
synopsis: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

title: American Graffiti
actors: [('Curt Henderson', 'Richard Dreyfuss'), ('Steve Bolander', 'Ron Howard'), ('John Milner', 'Paul Le Mat')]
synopsis: A couple of high school graduates spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

title: Asphalt Jungle, The
actors: [('Dix Handley', 'Sterling Hayden'), ('Alonzo D. Emmerich', 'Louis Calhern'), ('Doll Conovan', 'Jean Hagen')]
synopsis: Recently paroled from prison, legendary burglar "Doc" Riedenschneider, with funding from Alonzo Emmerich, a crooked lawyer, gathers a small group of veteran criminals together in the Midwest for a big jewel heist.

title: Searchers, The
actors: [('Ethan Edwards', 'John Wayne'), ('Martin Pawley', 'Jeffrey Hunter'), ('Laurie Jorgensen', 'Vera Miles')]
synopsis: As a Civil War veteran spends years searching for a young niece captured by Indians, his motivation becomes increasingly questionable.

title: Where Eagles Dare
synopsis: Released

title: Where Eagles Dare
synopsis: Released

title: Where Eagles Dare
synopsis: Released

title: Devil's Brigade, The
actors: [('Lt. Col. Robert T. Frederick', 'William Holden'), ('Major Alan Crown', 'Cliff Robertson'), ('Major Cliff Bricker', 'Vince Edwards')]
synopsis: 1968 American war film about the formation and first mission of the joint Canadian-American WWII special forces winter and mountain unit formally called 1st Special Service Force, but commonly known as “The Devil’s Brigade”.  The film dramatises the Brigade's first mission in the Italian Campaign, the task of capturing the German mountain stronghold Monte la Difensa, in December 1943.  The film is based on the 1966 book of the same name, co-written by American novelist and historian Robert H. Adleman and Col. George Walton, a member of the brigade.

title: Big Country, The
actors: [('James McKay', 'Gregory Peck'), ('Julie Maragon', 'Jean Simmons'), ('Patricia Terrill', 'Carroll Baker')]
synopsis: Retired, wealthy sea Captain Jame McKay arrives in the vast expanse of the West to marry fiancée Pat Terrill. McKay is a man whose values and approach to life are a mystery to the ranchers and ranch foreman Steve Leech takes an immediate dislike to him. Pat is spoiled, selfish and controlled by her wealthy father, Major Henry Terrill. The Major is involved in a ruthless civil war, over watering rights for cattle, with a rough hewn clan led by Rufus Hannassey. The land in question is owned by Julie Maragon and both Terrill and Hannassey want it.

title: Any Number Can Win (Mélodie en sous-sol )
actors: [('Charles', 'Jean Gabin'), ('Francis Verlot', 'Alain Delon'), ('Louis', 'Maurice Biraud')]
synopsis: Charles, a sixty-something career criminal, fresh out of jail, rejects his wife's plan for a quiet life of bourgeois respectability. He enlists a former cell mate, Francis, to assist him in pulling off one final score, a carefully planned assault on the vault of a Cannes casino.

title: Betrayed
actors: [('Catherine Weaver', 'Debra Winger'), ('Gary Simmons', 'Tom Berenger'), ("Michael 'Mike' Carnes", 'John Heard')]
synopsis: An FBI agent (Debra Winger) falls in love with a white supremacist (Tom Berenger) whose group she infiltrates.

title: Bound for Glory
actors: [('Woody Guthrie', 'David Carradine'), ('Ozark Bule', 'Ronny Cox'), ('Mary / Memphis Sue', 'Melinda Dillon')]
synopsis: A biography of Woody Guthrie, one of America's greatest folk singers. He left his dust-devastated Texas home in the 1930s to find work, discovering the suffering and strength of America's working class.

title: Bridge at Remagen, The
actors: [('Lt. Phil Hartman', 'George Segal'), ('Sgt. Angelo ("Angel")', 'Ben Gazzara'), ('Maj. Paul Krueger', 'Robert Vaughn')]
synopsis: In March of 1945, as the War in Europe is coming to a close, fighting erupts between German and American troops at the last remaining bridgehead across the Rhine.

title: Buck and the Preacher
actors: [('Buck', 'Sidney Poitier'), ('The Preacher', 'Harry Belafonte'), ('Ruth', 'Ruby Dee')]
synopsis: A wagon master and a con-man preacher help freed slaves dogged by cheap-labor agents out West.

title: Daughters of the Dust
actors: [('Nana Peazant', 'Cora Lee Day'), ('Eula Peazant', 'Alva Rogers'), ('Yellow Mary', 'Barbarao')]
synopsis: Languid look at the Gullah culture of the sea islands off the coast of South Carolina and Georgia where African folk-ways were maintained well into the 20th Century and was one of the last bastion of these mores in America.

title: Destination Moon
actors: [('Jim Barnes', 'John Archer'), ('Dr. Charles Cargraves', 'Warner Anderson'), ('General Thayer', 'Tom Powers')]
synopsis: Postulates the first manned trip to the moon, happening in the (then) near future, and being funded by a consortium of private backers. Assorted difficulties occur and must be overcome in-flight. Attempted to be realistic, with Robert A. Heinlein providing advice.

title: Fantastic Night, The (La Nuit Fantastique)
actors: [('Denis', 'Fernand Gravey'), ('Irène', 'Micheline Presle'), ('Thalès', 'Saturnin Fabre')]
synopsis: Denis, a poor student in philosophy, works as a night porter in the Paris market of Les Halles in order to pay for his studies. Constantly weary, he falls asleep and dreams of a beautiful girl in white, Irène, with whom he falls in love.

title: Hangmen Also Die
actors: [('Dr. Franticek Svoboda aka Karel Vanek', 'Brian Donlevy'), ('Prof. Stephen Novotny', 'Walter Brennan'), ('Nasha Novotny', 'Anna Lee')]
synopsis: During the Nazi occupation of Czechoslovakia, surgeon Dr. Franticek Svoboda, a Czech patriot, assassinates the brutal "Hangman of Europe", Reichsprotektor Reinhard Heydrich, and is wounded in the process. In his attempt to escape, he is helped by history professor Stephen Novotny and his daughter Mascha.

title: Ogre, The (Der Unhold)
actors: [('Abel Tiffauges', 'John Malkovich'), ('Rachel', 'Agnès Soral'), ('Fieldmarshall Hermann Goering', 'Volker Spengler')]
synopsis: Frenchman Abel Tiffauges likes children, and wants to protect them against the grown-ups. Falsely suspected as child molester, he's recruited as a soldier in the 2nd World War, but very soon he is taken prisoner of war.

title: On the Beach
actors: [('Dwight Towers', 'Gregory Peck'), ('Moira Davidson', 'Ava Gardner'), ('Julian Osborn', 'Fred Astaire')]
synopsis: In 1964, atomic war wipes out humanity in the northern hemisphere; one American submarine finds temporary safe haven in Australia, where life-as-usual covers growing despair. In denial about the loss of his wife and children in the holocaust, American Captain Towers meets careworn but gorgeous Moira Davidson, who begins to fall for him. The sub returns after reconnaissance a month (or less) before the end; will Towers and Moira find comfort with each other?

title: Railroaded!
actors: [('Duke Martin', 'John Ireland'), ('Rosie Ryan', 'Sheila Ryan'), ('Police Sgt. Mickey Ferguson', 'Hugh Beaumont')]
synopsis: A mobster frames an innocent man for the killing of a cop during a bookie joint holdup being run in the back of a beauty salon. Can Police Sgt. Mickey Ferguson be convinced that his girlfriend's brother is being railroaded?

title: Slaves to the Underground
actors: [('Shelly', 'Molly Gross'), ('Jimmy', 'Jason Bortz'), ('Suzy', 'Marisa Ryan')]
synopsis: The grunge girl band "No Exits" is just about to get a record deal. At this time Jimmy is appearing again, the former boy-friend of the band guitarist Shelly. She had left him because his friend had raped her. But he doesn't know that - up to now. Shelly has fallen in love with the band singer Suzy in the meantime. But she still loves Jimmy, too. So she moves to him again, what Suzy doesn't like that all. Especially because she is becoming a feminist.

title: Song of Freedom
actors: [("John 'Johnny' Zinga", 'Paul Robeson'), ('Ruth Zinga', 'Elisabeth Welch'), ('Gabriel Donozetti', 'Esme Percy')]
synopsis: John Zinga is a black dockworker in England in the 18th century, with a great baritone singing voice. He is discovered by an opera impresario, and is catapulted into great fame as an international opera star. Yet he feels alienated from his African past, and out of place in England. By chance, he is informed that an ancestral medallion that he wears is proof of his lineage to African kings, and he leaves fame and fortune to take his rightful place of royalty. Reunited with his people, he plans to improve their lives by combining the best of western technology with the best of traditional African ways.

title: Big Fella
actors: [('Joe', 'Paul Robeson'), ("Amanda 'Manda'", 'Elisabeth Welch'), ('Spike', 'Roy Emerton')]
synopsis: In this musical comedy, Paul Robeson stars as Joe, a Marseilles docker hired by a wealthy English couple to find their missing son. When Joe finds him, he learns he escaped of his own will, and takes him to stay with a local singer. They offer him a refuge from his repressed white parents.

title: Taking of Pelham One Two Three, The
actors: [('Lt. Zachary Garber', 'Walter Matthau'), ('Mr. Blue - Bernard Ryder', 'Robert Shaw'), ('Mr. Green - Harold Longman', 'Martin Balsam')]
synopsis: In New York, armed men hijack a subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. Even if it's paid, how could they get away?

title: Volunteers
actors: [('Lawrence Whatley Bourne III', 'Tom Hanks'), ('Tom Tuttle', 'John Candy'), ('Beth Wexler', 'Rita Wilson')]
synopsis: Lawrence is a rich kid with a bad accent and a large debt. After his father refuses to help him out, Lawrence escapes his angry debtors by jumping on a Peace Corp flight to Southeast Asia, where he is assigned to build a bridge for the local villagers with American-As-Apple-Pie WSU Grad Tom Tuttle and the beautiful and down-to earth Beth Wexler.

title: JFK
actors: [('Jim Garrison', 'Kevin Costner'), ('Clay Shaw/Clay Bertrand', 'Tommy Lee Jones'), ('Lee Harvey Oswald', 'Gary Oldman')]
synopsis: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

title: Who's Harry Crumb?
actors: [('Harry Crumb', 'John Candy'), ('Eliot Draisen', 'Jeffrey Jones'), ('Helen Downing', 'Annie Potts')]
synopsis: Harry Crumb is a bumbling and inept private investigator who is hired to solve the kidnapping of a young heiress which he's not expected to solve because his employer is the mastermind behind the kidnapping.

title: Harry and the Hendersons
actors: [('George Henderson', 'John Lithgow'), ('Nancy Henderson', 'Melinda Dillon'), ('Sarah Henderson', 'Margaret Langrick')]
synopsis: Returning from a hunting trip in the forest, the Henderson family's car hits an animal in the road. At first they fear it was a man, but when they examine the "body" they find it's a "bigfoot". They think it's dead so they decide to take it home (there could be some money in this). As you guessed, it isn't dead. Far from being the ferocious monster they fear "Harry" to be, he's a friendly giant.

title: Let's Get Harry
actors: [('Corey', 'Michael Schoeffling'), ('Norman Shrike', 'Robert Duvall'), ('Jack', 'Gary Busey')]
synopsis: Harry Burck has been kidnapped by South American terrorists, and when the US Government refuses to intervene, Harry's friends decide to take matters into their own hands!

title: Shanghai Surprise
actors: [('Gloria Tatlock', 'Madonna'), ('Glendon Wasey', 'Sean Penn'), ('Walter Faraday', 'Paul Freeman')]
synopsis: Glendon Wasey is a fortune hunter looking for a fast track out of China. Gloria Tatlock is a missionary nurse seeking the curing powers of opium for her patients. Fate sets them on a hectic, exotic, and even romantic quest for stolen drugs. But they are up against every thug and smuggler in Shangai.

title: Who's That Girl?
actors: [('Nikki Finn', 'Madonna'), ('Loudon Trott', 'Griffin Dunne'), ('Ms. Worthington', 'Bibi Besch')]
synopsis: An uptight New York tax lawyer gets his life turned upside down, all in a single day, when he's asked to escort a feisty and free-spirited female ex-convict whom asks him to help prove her innocence of her crime.

title: She-Devil
actors: [('Mary Fisher', 'Meryl Streep'), ('Bob', 'Ed Begley Jr.'), ('Hooper', 'Linda Hunt')]
synopsis: A cunning and resourceful housewife vows revenge on her husband when he begins an affair with a wealthy romance novelist.

title: Date with an Angel
actors: [('Jim Sanders', 'Michael E. Knight'), ('Patty Winston', 'Phoebe Cates'), ('Angel', 'Emmanuelle Béart')]
synopsis: Aspiring composer Jim Sanders is engaged to spoiled rich girl Patty. But the morning after his bachelor party, Jim wakes up to discover a beautiful, broken-winged angel in his pool. When everyone finds out about his heavenly houseguest, Jim must cope with a dangerously jealous fiancée, an exploitive future father-in-law and a group of buddies with an outrageous business plan!

title: Blind Date
actors: [('Nadia Gates', 'Kim Basinger'), ('Walter Davis', 'Bruce Willis'), ('David Bedford', 'John Larroquette')]
synopsis: When bachelor Walter Davis (Bruce Willis) is set up with his sister-in-law's pretty cousin, Nadia Gates (Kim Basinger), a seemingly average blind date turns into a chaotic night on the town. Walter's brother, Ted (Phil Hartman), tells him not to let Nadia drink alcohol, but he dismisses the warning, and her behavior gets increasingly wild. Walter and Nadia's numerous incidents are made even worse as her former lover David (John Larroquette) relentlessly follows them around town.

title: Nadine
actors: [('Vernon Hightower', 'Jeff Bridges'), ('Nadine Hightower', 'Kim Basinger'), ('Buford Pope', 'Rip Torn')]
synopsis: Hairdresser Nadine Hightower wants to retrieve the risqué photos she once posed for, but when she visits the photographer at his office, he's murdered by an intruder. Nadine talks her estranged husband, Vernon, into going along when she returns to the office, where they stumble across plans for a less than legal construction project. But when Vernon tries to turn the documents into a cash windfall, he and Nadine are pursued by goons with guns.

title: Muppet Movie, The
actors: [("Kermit the Frog / Rowlf / Dr. Teeth / Waldorf / Doc Hopper's Men / Link Hogthrob / Swedish Chef (voice)", 'Jim Henson'), ("Miss Piggy / Fozzie Bear / Animal / Sam the Eagle / Doc Hopper's Men / Marvin Suggs (uncredited) / Swedish Chef (hands) (uncredited) / Motorcycle Guy (uncredited) (voice)", 'Frank Oz'), ('Floyd Pepper / Robin the Frog / Crazy Harry / Lew Zealand / Camilla / Dr. Bunsen Honeydew (assistant) (uncredited) (voice)', 'Jerry Nelson')]
synopsis: Kermit the Frog is persuaded by agent Dom DeLuise to pursue a career in Hollywood. Along the way, Kermit picks up Fozzie Bear, Miss Piggy, Gonzo, and a motley crew of other Muppets with similar aspirations. Meanwhile, Kermit must elude the grasp of a frog-leg restaurant magnate.

title: Great Muppet Caper, The
actors: [('Kermit the Frog', 'Jim Henson'), ('Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear, Animal', 'Frank Oz'), ('Gonzo, Beauregard, Dr. Bunson Honeydew', 'Dave Goelz')]
synopsis: Kermit and Fozzie are newspaper reporters sent to London to interview Lady Holiday, a wealthy fashion designer whose priceless diamond necklace is stolen. Kermit meets and falls in love with her secretary, Miss Piggy. The jewel thieves strike again, and this time frame Miss Piggy. It's up to Kermit and Muppets to bring the real culprits to justice.

title: Muppets Take Manhattan, The
actors: [('Kermit the Frog / Rowlf / Dr. Teeth / Waldorf / Swedish Chef / Ernie / Granny / Horse & Carriage Rider / Link Hogthrob / The Newsman (voice)', 'Jim Henson'), ('Miss Piggy / Fozzie / Animal / Bert / Cookie Monster / Ocean Breeze Soap Board Member / Sam the Eagle (voice)', 'Frank Oz'), ('Gonzo / Chester - Rat / Bill - Frog / Zoot / Beauregard / Dog / Dr. Bunsen Honeydew / Penguin (voice)', 'Dave Goelz')]
synopsis: When the Muppets graduate from Danhurst College, they take their song-filled senior revue to New York City, only to learn that it isn't easy to find a producer who's willing to back a show starring a frog and a pig. Of course, Kermit the Frog and Miss Piggy won't take no for an answer, launching a search for someone to take them to Broadway.

title: Sesame Street Presents Follow That Bird
actors: [('Truck Driver', 'Waylon Jennings'), ('Grouch Waitress', 'Sandra Bernhard'), ('State Trooper', 'John Candy')]
synopsis: Follow that bird Big Bird, of course for an imaginative, magical treat starring the cast of TVs Sesame Street in their first movie.

title: We're Back! A Dinosaur's Story
actors: [('Rex (voice)', 'John Goodman'), ('Vorb (voice)', 'Jay Leno'), ('Captain Neweyes (voice)', 'Walter Cronkite')]
synopsis: Captain New Eyes travels back in time and feeds dinosaurs his Brain Grain cereal, which makes them intelligent and non-violent. They agree to go to the Middle Future in order to grant the wishes of children in New York city. They are to meet Dr. Bleeb of the Museum of Natural History, but get sidetracked with their new children friends and run into the Captain's evil brother, Professor

title: Baby... Secret of the Lost Legend
actors: [('George Loomis', 'William Katt'), ('Susan Matthews-Loomis', 'Sean Young'), ('Doctor Eric Kiviat', 'Patrick McGoohan')]
synopsis: Paleontologist and her husband discover a mother and baby brontosaurus in Africa, try to protect them from hunters who want to capture them.

title: Turtle Diary
actors: [('Neaera Duncan', 'Glenda Jackson'), ('William Snow', 'Ben Kingsley'), ('George Fairbairn (turtle keeper)', 'Michael Gambon')]
synopsis: Two separate people, a man and a woman, find something very stirring about the sea turtles in their tank at the London Zoo. They meet and form an odd, but sympathetic camaraderie as they plan to steal two of the turtles and free them into the ocean.

title: Raise the Titanic
actors: [('Master Chief Vinnie Walker', 'M. Emmet Walsh'), ('Dirk Pitt', 'Richard Jordan'), ('Dr. Gene Seagram', 'David Selby')]
synopsis: To obtain a supply of a rare mineral, a ship raising operation is conducted for the only known source, the Titanic.

title: Titanic
actors: [('Richard Ward Sturges', 'Clifton Webb'), ('Julia Sturges', 'Barbara Stanwyck'), ('Gifford "Giff" Rogers', 'Robert Wagner')]
synopsis: Unhappily married, Julia Sturges decides to go to America with her two children on the unsinkable Titanic. Her husband, Richard also arranges passage on the luxury liner so as to have custody of their two children. All this fades to insignificance once the ship hits an iceberg.

title: Night to Remember, A
actors: [('Second Officer Charles Herbert Lightoller', 'Kenneth More'), ('Mr. Clarke', 'Ronald Allen'), ('Maj. Arthur Peuchen', 'Robert Ayres')]
synopsis: The sinking of the Titanic is presented in a highly realistic fashion in this tense British drama. The disaster is portrayed largely from the perspective of the ocean liner's second officer, Charles Lightoller. Despite numerous warnings about ice, the ship sails on, with Capt. Edward John Smith keeping it going at a steady clip. When the doomed vessel finally hits an iceberg, the crew and passengers discover that they lack enough lifeboats, and tragedy follows.

title: Captain Horatio Hornblower
actors: [('Captain Horatio Hornblower R N', 'Gregory Peck'), ('Lady Barbara Wellesley', 'Virginia Mayo'), ('Lt William Bush', 'Robert Beatty')]
synopsis: A naval adventure, based on the novels by C.S. Forester, about the heroic, 19th-century British seafarer. The story sails with his ship, the Lydia, through battles with Spain and then France won with wit rather than might.

title: Carriers Are Waiting, The (Les Convoyeurs Attendent)
actors: [('Roger', 'Benoît Poelvoorde'), ('Louise', 'Morgane Simon'), ("L'entraîneur", 'Bouli Lanners')]
synopsis: No overview found.

title: Erin Brockovich
actors: [('Erin Brockovich', 'Julia Roberts'), ('Ed Masry', 'Albert Finney'), ('George', 'Aaron Eckhart')]
synopsis: A twice-divorced mother of three who sees an injustice, takes on the bad guy and wins -- with a little help from her push-up bra. Erin goes to work for an attorney and comes across medical records describing illnesses clustered in one nearby town. She starts investigating and soon exposes a monumental cover-up.

title: Final Destination
actors: [('Alex Chance Browning', 'Devon Sawa'), ('Clear Rivers', 'Ali Larter'), ('Carter Horton', 'Kerr Smith')]
synopsis: After a teenager has a terrifying vision of him and his friends dying in a plane crash, he prevents the accident only to have Death hunt them down, one by one.

title: Soft Fruit
actors: [('Patsy', 'Jeanie Drynan'), ('Vic', 'Linal Haft'), ('Bo', 'Russell Dykstra')]
synopsis: For the first time in 15 years, all four siblings in a family show up to care for their dying mother, who is only given a couple of weeks to live. One comes from America with her two children. A divorced sister also comes with her child and sneaks off regularly to meet a mystery man who may be her ex-husband. The third & youngest daughter is an unmarried nurse aware of her ticking biological clock. The only son chases after his grumpy father who seems to not care a whit about his wife's circumstances. The four are also faced my their mother's dreams to accomplish a few things before she dies - to visit a beach she had visited in the past, to see her youngest married, and to visit Paris. She also wants to be embalmed and be honored with a 21 gun salute. Thus the whole group has to set off in the quest to fulfill their mother's wishes.

title: Babymother
actors: [('', 'Anjela Lauren Smith'), ('', 'Caroline Chikezie'), ('', 'Don Warrington')]
synopsis: A single mother determined to make it as a singer puts together an all girl reggae group named Neeta, Sweeta, & Nastie with her friends. Living in a housing project with little support, the odds are obviously against her. Emotionally she struggles too as she learns at her mother's death that her actual mother is the woman she had thought was her older sister. With the help of a female agent, the group starts to get some exposure and rises above their setting.

title: Bear, The
actors: [('Tom', 'Tchéky Karyo'), ('Bill', 'Jack Wallace'), ('Le chasseur aux chiens', 'André Lacombe')]
synopsis: An orphan bear cub hooks up with an adult male as they try to dodge human hunters.

title: Impact
actors: [('Walter Williams', 'Brian Donlevy'), ('Marsha Peters', 'Ella Raines'), ('Lt. Quincy', 'Charles Coburn')]
synopsis: No-nonsense San Francisco industrial whiz Walter Williams's two-timing wife and her lover plot to do her husband in, but Williams survives the "accident" and the lover is burned beyond recognition while driving Williams's car. Half-dazed, Williams stumbles into a moving van that takes him to idyllic Larkspur, Idaho, where newspaper stories of his "death" jog his memory. While recuperating and plotting his eventual return and revenge, Williams falls in love with Marsha, an auto mechanic. But when Williams finally gets back to San Francisco, he's charged with the lover's murder.

title: Love Is a Many-Splendored Thing
actors: [('Mark Elliott', 'William Holden'), ('Dr. Han Suyin', 'Jennifer Jones'), ('Humphrey Palmer-Jones', 'Torin Thatcher')]
synopsis: A widowed doctor of both Chinese and European descent falls in love with a married American correspondent in Hong Kong during China's Communist revolution.

title: Mirror, The (Zerkalo)
actors: [('Matka/Natalya', 'Margarita Terekhova'), ('The Father', 'Oleg Yankovskiy'), ('Lisa', 'Alla Demidova')]
synopsis: A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell of the recent history of all the Russian nation.

title: Trial, The (Le Procès)
synopsis: Released

title: Trial, The (Le Procès)
synopsis: Released

title: Trial, The (Le Procès)
synopsis: Released

title: Crimson Pirate, The
actors: [('Capt. Vallo (The Crimson Pirate)', 'Burt Lancaster'), ('Ojo', 'Nick Cravat'), ('Consuelo', 'Eva Bartok')]
synopsis: Burt Lancaster plays a pirate with a taste for intrigue and acrobatics who involves himself in the goings on of a revolution in the Caribbean in the late 1700s. A light hearted adventure involving prison breaks, an oddball Scientist, sailing ships, naval fights, and tons of swordplay.

title: Thelma & Louise
actors: [('Louise Elizabeth Sawyer', 'Susan Sarandon'), ('Thelma Yvonne Dickinson', 'Geena Davis'), ('Investigator Hal Slocumb', 'Harvey Keitel')]
synopsis: Whilst on a short weekend getaway, Louise shoots a man who had tried to rape Thelma. Due to the incriminating circumstances, they make a run for it and thus a cross country chase ensues for the two fugitives. Along the way, both women rediscover the strength of their friendship and surprising aspects of their personalities and self-strengths in the trying times.

title: Something for Everyone
actors: [('Konrad Ludwig', 'Michael York'), ('Countess Herthe von Ornstein', 'Angela Lansbury'), ('Helmuth von Ornstein', 'Anthony Higgins')]
synopsis: An opportunistic young man working as a servant to a European countess uses his sexual talents to better his station in life.

title: ...And Justice for All
actors: [('Arthur Kirkland', 'Al Pacino'), ('Judge Francis Rayford', 'Jack Warden'), ('Judge Henry T. Fleming', 'John Forsythe')]
synopsis: An ethical Baltimore defense lawyer disgusted with rampant legal corruption is asked to defend a judge he despises in a rape trial. But if he doesn't do it, the judge will have him disbarred.

title: Animal House
actors: [('John "Bluto" Blutarski', 'John Belushi'), ('Eric "Otter" Stratton', 'Tim Matheson'), ('Dean Vernon Wormer', 'John Vernon')]
synopsis: At a 1962 College, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

title: She's Gotta Have It
actors: [('Nola Darling', 'Tracy Camilla Johns'), ('Jamie Overstreet', 'Tommy Redmond Hicks'), ('Greer Childs', 'John Canada Terrell')]
synopsis: The story of Nola Darling's simultaneous sexual relationships with three different men is told by her and by her partners and other friends. All three men wanted her to commit solely to them; Nola resists being "owned" by a single partner.

title: School Daze
actors: [('Leeds', 'Samuel L. Jackson'), ('Dap', 'Laurence Fishburne'), ('Julian', 'Giancarlo Esposito')]
synopsis: In the South of the United States are taking place confrontations between two groups of students who have different ideas and are not able to accept the one of the oponent.

title: Do the Right Thing
actors: [('Sal', 'Danny Aiello'), ('Da Mayor', 'Ossie Davis'), ('Mother Sister', 'Ruby Dee')]
synopsis: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

title: Mo' Better Blues
actors: [('Bleek Gilliam', 'Denzel Washington'), ('Giant', 'Spike Lee'), ('Shadow Henderson (Sax)', 'Wesley Snipes')]
synopsis: Opens with Bleek as a child learning to play the trumpet, his friends want him to come out and play but mother insists he finish his lessons. Bleek grows into adulthood and forms his own band - The Bleek Gilliam Quartet. The story of Bleek's and Shadow's friendly rivalry on stage which spills into their professional relationship and threatens to tear apart the quartet.

title: Jungle Fever
actors: [('Cyrus', 'Spike Lee'), ('Angie Tucci', 'Annabella Sciorra'), ('Lucinda Purify', 'Ruby Dee')]
synopsis: A successful and married black man contemplates having an affair with a white girl from work. He's quite rightly worried that the racial difference would make an already taboo relationship even worse.

title: Coogan's Bluff
actors: [('Coogan', 'Clint Eastwood'), ('Lt. McElroy', 'Lee J. Cobb'), ('Julie', 'Susan Clark')]
synopsis: Coogan (Clint Eastwood) an Arizona deputy sheriff goes to New York to pick up a prisoner. While escorting the prisoner to the airport he escapes and Coogan heads into the City to recapture him.

title: Champ, The
actors: [('Billy', 'Jon Voight'), ('Annie', 'Faye Dunaway'), ('T.J.', 'Ricky Schroder')]
synopsis: The more you love, the harder you fight.The world looks at Billy Flynn and sees a has-been who seemingly never was, an ex-boxing champion slammed to the mat years ago by booze and gambling. But Billy's son TJ sees what the world doesn't. He knows his flawed but loving father is, was and always will be The Champ.

title: Creature Comforts
synopsis: Interviews with the public are used to put words in animal mouths, in the Oscar-winning film from the creator of Wallace and Gromit.

title: Death Wish
actors: [('Paul Kersey', 'Charles Bronson'), ('Joanna Kersey', 'Hope Lange'), ('Det. Frank Ochoa', 'Vincent Gardenia')]
synopsis: A New York City architect becomes a one-man vigilante squad after his wife is murdered by street punks in which he randomly goes out and kills would-be muggers on the mean streets after dark.

title: Death Wish II
actors: [('Paul Kersey', 'Charles Bronson'), ('Geri Nichols', 'Jill Ireland'), ('Det. Frank Ochoa', 'Vincent Gardenia')]
synopsis: Paul Kersey is again a vigilante trying to find five punks who murdered his housekeeper and daughter in Los Angeles.

title: Death Wish 3
actors: [('Paul Kersey', 'Charles Bronson'), ('Kathryn Davis', 'Deborah Raffin'), ('Insp. Richard S. Shriker', 'Ed Lauter')]
synopsis: Paul Kersey returns to New York to visit his friend Charley, who lives in one of the worst parts of New York City. But when Paul arrives at Charley's apartment, he finds Charley dying after a vicious beating by a gang led by Manny Fraker, and the police enter the apartment and find Paul standing over Charley's body. Paul is arrested for the murder, but police chief Richard S. Shriker is like Paul.

title: Death Wish 4: The Crackdown
actors: [('Paul Kersey', 'Charles Bronson'), ('Karen Sheldon', 'Kay Lenz'), ('Nathan White', 'John P. Ryan')]
synopsis: After the death of his girlfriend's daughter from a drug overdose, Paul Kersey (Charles Bronson) takes on the local drug cartel.

title: Death Wish V: The Face of Death
actors: [('Paul Kersey', 'Charles Bronson'), ('Olivia Regent', 'Lesley-Anne Down'), ("Tommy O'Shea", 'Michael Parks')]
synopsis: Paul Kersey is back at working vigilante justice when when his fiancée, Olivia, has her business threatened by mobsters

title: Double Indemnity
actors: [('Walter Neff', 'Fred MacMurray'), ('Phyllis Dietrichson', 'Barbara Stanwyck'), ('Barton Keyes', 'Edward G. Robinson')]
synopsis: Unsuspecting Mr. Dietrichson becomes increasingly accident prone after his icily calculating wife encourages him to sign a double indemnity policy proposed by a smooth-talking insurance agent. Against a backdrop of distinctly California settings, the partners in crime plan the perfect murder to collect the insurance. Perfect until a claims manager gets a familiar feeling of foul play and pursues the matter relentlessly.

title: Dying Young
actors: [("Hilary O'Neil", 'Julia Roberts'), ('Victor Gaddes', 'Campbell Scott'), ('Gordon', "Vincent D'Onofrio")]
synopsis: After she discovers that her boyfriend has betrayed her, Hilary O'Neil is looking for a new start and a new job. She begins to work as a private nurse for a young man suffering from blood cancer. Slowly, they fall in love, but they always know their love cannot last because he is destined to die.

title: Cool as Ice
actors: [('Johnny', 'Vanilla Ice'), ('Kathy', 'Kristin Minter'), ('Singer at First Club', 'Naomi Campbell')]
synopsis: Johnny, a freewheeling, motorcycle-riding musician, rolls into a small town with his band, and meets Kathy, an honor student who catches his eye. Meanwhile, Kathy's father, after being in the Witness Protection Program, is finally found by the two corrupt cops he escaped from years ago, who claim he owes them a lot of money.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
actors: [("April O'Neal", 'Judith Hoag'), ('Casey Jones', 'Elias Koteas'), ('Raphael (voice) / Passenger In Cab', 'Josh Pais')]
synopsis: A quartet of mutated humanoid turtles clash with an uprising criminal gang of ninjas

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
actors: [("April O'Neil", 'Paige Turco'), ('Professor Jordon Perry', 'David Warner'), ('Michaelangelo / Soho Man', 'Michelan Sisti')]
synopsis: The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last cannister of the ooze that created the Turtles, which Shredder wants to create an army of new mutants.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
actors: [("April O'Neil", 'Paige Turco'), ('Walker', 'Stuart Wilson'), ('Lord Norinaga', 'Sab Shimono')]
synopsis: The four turtles travel back in time to the days of the legendary and deadly samurai in ancient Japan, where they train to perfect the art of becoming one. The turtles also assist a small village in an uprising.

title: Red Dawn
actors: [('Jed', 'Patrick Swayze'), ('Robert', 'C. Thomas Howell'), ('Erica', 'Lea Thompson')]
synopsis: It is the mid-1980s. From out of the sky, Soviet and Cuban troops begin landing on the football field of a Colorado high school. In seconds, the paratroops have attacked the school and sent a group of teenagers fleeing into the mountains. Armed only with hunting rifles, pistols and bows and arrows, the teens struggles to survive the bitter winter and Soviet KGB patrols hunting for them.

title: Band of the Hand
actors: [('Joe', 'Stephen Lang'), ('Nikki', 'Lauren Holly'), ('J.L.', 'John Cameron Mitchell')]
synopsis: An Indian Vietnam veteran trains five street punks in the Everglades to fight vice in Miami.

title: Born American
actors: [('Savoy', 'Mike Norris'), ('Mitch', 'Steve Durham'), ('K.C.', 'David Coburn')]
synopsis: Three American students vacationing in Finland, cross the border into Russia for fun of it. When they are spotted by the Russian soldiers who are shooting to kill, it's not fun anymore. Captured and thrown in jail, they find it's not fun either. It's a nightmare.

title: Bloodsport
actors: [('Frank Dux', 'Jean-Claude Van Damme'), ('Chong Li', 'Bolo Yeung'), ('Senzo Tanaka', 'Roy Chiao')]
synopsis: Frank Dux has entered the "kumite", an illegal underground martial-arts competition where serious injury and even death are not unknown. Chong Li, a particularly ruthless and vicious fighter is the favorite, but then again Dux has not fought him yet.

title: Eyes of Laura Mars
actors: [('Laura Mars', 'Faye Dunaway'), ('John Neville', 'Tommy Lee Jones'), ('Tommy Ludlow', 'Brad Dourif')]
synopsis: A famous fashion photographer develops a disturbing ability to see through the eyes of a killer.

title: Funny Bones
actors: [('George Fawkes', 'Jerry Lewis'), ('Tommy Fawkes', 'Oliver Platt'), ('Jack Parker', 'Lee Evans')]
synopsis: Tommy Fawkes wants to be a successful comedian but his Las Vegas debut is a failure. He goes back to Blackpool, UK, where his father, also a comedian started and where he spent the summers of his childhood. He starts to search for a partner, a comic relief, with whom he can be famous.

title: Good Earth, The
actors: [('Wang Lung', 'Paul Muni'), ('O-Lan', 'Luise Rainer'), ('Uncle', 'Walter Connolly')]
synopsis: The story follows Wang Lung (Paul Muni), a humble farmer, who makes an arranged marriage to a slave, O-Lan (Luise Rainer). The couple's great struggle is to procure--and then, against withering odds, keep--a piece of land, ownership of which makes the difference between self-determination and near-slavery. The film's physical production is truly eye-filling, with location shooting in China providing exterior shots and backdrops (and blending seamlessly with the footage shot in the U.S.). No wonder the great cinematographer Karl Freund won an Oscar for the photography, which includes an awesomely staged locust plague.

title: Good Morning, Vietnam
actors: [('Adrian Cronauer', 'Robin Williams'), ('Edward Montesque Garlick', 'Forest Whitaker'), ('Tuan', 'Tung Thanh Tran')]
synopsis: Radio funny man Adrian Cronauer is sent to Vietnam to bring a little comedy back into the lives of the soldiers. After setting up shop, Cronauer delights the G.I.s but shocks his superior officer, Sergeant Major Dickerson, with his irreverent take on the war. While Dickerson attempts to censor Cronauer's broadcasts, Cronauer pursues a relationship with a Vietnamese girl named Trinh, who shows him the horrors of war first-hand.

title: Good Mother, The
actors: [('Anna', 'Diane Keaton'), ('Leo', 'Liam Neeson'), ('Muth', 'Jason Robards')]
synopsis: After finding a sexually liberated boyfriend, a divorced woman gets sued over daughter's custody, by her ex, who claims that her lover has a bad influence on the kid.

title: Grumpy Old Men
actors: [('John Gustafson', 'Jack Lemmon'), ('Max Goldman', 'Walter Matthau'), ('Ariel Truax', 'Ann-Margret')]
synopsis: For decades, next-door neighbors and former friends John and Max have feuded, trading insults and wicked pranks. When an attractive widow moves in nearby, their bad blood erupts into a high-stakes rivalry full of naughty jokes and adolescent hijinks. Will this love triangle destroy the two old grumps? Or will the geriatric odd couple overcome their differences and rediscover their friendship?

title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
actors: [('Matt Drayton', 'Spencer Tracy'), ('Dr. John Wade Prentice', 'Sidney Poitier'), ('Christina Drayton', 'Katharine Hepburn')]
synopsis: Matt and Christina Drayton are a couple whose attitudes are challenged when their daughter brings home a fiancé who is black.

title: Romeo Must Die
actors: [('Hang Sing', 'Jet Li'), ('Trish O`Day', 'Aaliyah'), ('Mac', 'Isaiah Washington')]
synopsis: Two warring gang families (one African-American, the other Chinese) maneuver for bragging rights to the Oakland, California, docks. Hang SIng and Trish O'Day uncover a trail of deceit that leaves most of the warring factions dead … or worse!

title: Here on Earth
actors: [('Samantha Cavanaugh', 'Leelee Sobieski'), ('Kelvin Morse', 'Chris Klein'), ('Jasper Arnold', 'Josh Hartnett')]
synopsis: A rich college kid is taught a lesson after a joy ride ends up destroying a country restaurant.

title: Whatever It Takes
actors: [('Ashley Grant', "Jodi Lyn O'Keefe"), ('Ryan Woodman', 'Shane West'), ('Maggie Carter', 'Marla Sokoloff')]
synopsis: A nerdy teen, Ryan Woodman is smitten with the popular and gorgeous Ashley Grant, who apparently has no interest in him. Meanwhile, dim star athlete Chris Campbell has his eye on Ryan's brainy and beautiful friend, Maggie Carter. The two agree to help each other in their romantic quests, but, as they come closer to their goals, both Ryan and Chris suspect that they might be pursuing the wrong girls.

title: Buddy Boy
actors: [('Gloria', 'Emmanuelle Seigner'), ('Sal', 'Susan Tyrrell'), ('Francis', 'Aidan Gillen')]
synopsis: An introvert relieves the tedium of caring for his invalid mother by spying on his neighbor.

title: Color of Paradise, The (Rang-e Khoda)
actors: [('Vater', 'Hossein Mahjoub'), ('Mohammad', 'Mohsen Ramezani'), ('Großmutter', 'Salameh Feyzi')]
synopsis: The story revolves around a blind boy named Mohammed who is released from his special school in Tehran for summer vacation. His father, shamed and burdened by Mohammed's blindness, arrives late to pick him up and then tries to convince the headmaster to keep Mohammed over the summer. The headmaster refuses, so Mohammed's father eventually takes him home.

title: Waking the Dead
actors: [('Fielding Pierce', 'Billy Crudup'), ('Sarah Williams', 'Jennifer Connelly'), ('Danny Pierce', 'Paul Hipp')]
synopsis: A congressional candidate questions his sanity after seeing the love of his life, presumed dead, suddenly emerge.

title: Blood and Sand (Sangre y Arena)
actors: [('Doña Sol', 'Sharon Stone'), ('Juan Gallardo', 'Christopher Rydell'), ('Carmen Espinosa', 'Ana Torrent')]
synopsis: Remake of the tale of an acclaimed matador who finds himself involved with a beautiful woman, jeopardizing both his marriage and career.

title: Gothic
actors: [('Byron', 'Gabriel Byrne'), ('Shelley', 'Julian Sands'), ('Mary Shelley', 'Natasha Richardson')]
synopsis: The year is 1816. A sprawling villa in Switzerland is the setting for a stormy night of madness.  On this night of the "Haunted Summer," five famous friends gather around an ancient skull to conjure up their darkest fears.  Poets Lord Byron and Percy Shelley, Shelley's fiancée Mary Godwin, Mary's stepsister Claire Clairemont and Byron's friend John Polidori spend a hallucinogenic evening confronting their fears in a frenzy of shocking lunacy.  Horrifying visions invade the castle - realizations of Byron's fear of leeches, Shelley's fear of premature burial, Mary's fear of birthing a stillborn child - all brought forth in a bizarre dreamscape.  They share the terrifying fantasies that chase them through the castle that night.  The events of that night later inspired Mary Shelley to write the classic "Frankenstein" and Dr. Polidori to pen "The Vampyre," which became the basis for the creation of Dracula..

title: Hillbillys in a Haunted House
actors: [('Woody Wetherby', 'Ferlin Husky'), ('Boots Malone', 'Joi Lansing'), ('Jeepers', 'Don Bowman')]
synopsis: Country singers on their way to Nashville have car trouble, forcing them to stop at an old haunted mansion. Soon they realize that the house is not only haunted, but is also the headquarters of a ring of international spies after a top secret formula for rocket fuel.

title: Lord of the Flies
actors: [('Ralph', 'James Aubrey'), ('Jack', 'Tom Chapin'), ('Piggy', 'Hugh Edwards')]
synopsis: Amidst a nuclear war, a plane carrying a group of schoolboys crash lands on a deserted island. With no adult survivors, the boys are forced to fend for themselves. At first they cooperate, but when the they split into two separate camps -- one led by the pragmatic Ralph and the other by militaristic Jack -- their society falls into disarray, leading to a disturbing examination of human nature and a chilling conclusion.

title: Modern Times
actors: [('A factory worker', 'Charlie Chaplin'), ('A gamin', 'Paulette Goddard'), ('Cafe proprietor', 'Henry Bergman')]
synopsis: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

title: Last Resort
actors: [('Sam', 'Corey Feldman'), ('Dave', 'Corey Haim'), ('Alex', 'Demetra Hampton')]
synopsis: Sam and Dave are living the boring life until they are beckoned to Sam's uncle's Island. When they get there (still not quite sure how that worked) they are compelled by beautiful women and a dastardly enemy of the Island. After accidentally convincing Sam's uncle to sign away rights to his island, they must somehow fix the problem.

title: Solar Crisis
actors: [('Steve Kelso', 'Tim Matheson'), ('Adm. Skeet Kelso', 'Charlton Heston'), ('Arnold Teague', 'Peter Boyle')]
synopsis: A huge solar flare is predicted to fry the Earth. Astronauts aboard the spaceship Helios must go to the Sun to drop a bomb equipped with an Artificial Intelligence (Freddy) and a Japanese pilot (as a back up if the Artificial Intelligence fail) at the right time so the flare will point somewhere else.

title: That's Life!
actors: [('Harvey Fairchild', 'Jack Lemmon'), ('Gillian Fairchild', 'Julie Andrews'), ('Holly Parrish', 'Sally Kellerman')]
synopsis: A wealthy architect struggles with a severe case of male menopause at the approach of his 60th birthday.

title: Heart and Souls
actors: [('Thomas Reilly', 'Robert Downey Jr.'), ('Harrison Winslow', 'Charles Grodin'), ('Julia', 'Kyra Sedgwick')]
synopsis: A businessman is reunited with the four lost souls who were his guardian angels during childhood, all with a particular purpose to joining the afterlife.

title: Hud
actors: [('Hud Bannon', 'Paul Newman'), ('Homer Bannon', 'Melvyn Douglas'), ('Alma Brown', 'Patricia Neal')]
synopsis: Hud Bannon is a ruthless young man who tarnishes everything and everyone he touches. Hud represents the perfect embodiment of alienated youth, out for kicks with no regard for the consequences. There is bitter conflict between the callous Hud and his stern and highly principled father, Homer. Hud's nephew Lon admires Hud's cheating ways, though he soon becomes too aware of Hud's reckless amorality to bear him anymore. In the world of the takers and the taken, Hud is a winner. He's a cheat, but, he explains, "I always say the law was meant to be interpreted in a lenient manner."

title: Hustler, The
actors: [('Eddie Felson', 'Paul Newman'), ('Minnesota Fats', 'Jackie Gleason'), ('Sarah Packard', 'Piper Laurie')]
synopsis: Fast Eddie Felson is a small-time pool hustler with a lot of talent but a self-destructive attitude. His bravado causes him to challenge the legendary Minnesota Fats to a high-stakes match.

title: Inherit the Wind
actors: [('Henry Drummond', 'Spencer Tracy'), ('Matthew Harrison Brady', 'Fredric March'), ('E.K. Hornbeck', 'Gene Kelly')]
synopsis: This gripping adaptation of the Jerome Lawrence-Robert E. Lee play examines an issue that still causes great controversy: the role religion should play in the schools.

title: Dersu Uzala
actors: [('Arsenev', 'Yuriy Solomin'), ('Dersu Uzala', 'Maksim Munzuk'), ('Olenin', 'Aleksandr Pyatkov')]
synopsis: A military explorer meets and befriends a Goldi man in Russia’s unmapped forests. A deep and abiding bond evolves between the two men, one civilized in the usual sense, the other at home in the glacial Siberian woods.

title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
actors: [('Roy Neary', 'Richard Dreyfuss'), ('Claude Lacombe', 'François Truffaut'), ('Ronnie Neary', 'Teri Garr')]
synopsis: After an encounter with UFOs, a line worker feels undeniably drawn to an isolated area in the wilderness where something spectacular is about to happen.

title: Horror Hotel (a.k.a. The City of the Dead)
actors: [('Prof. Alan Driscoll', 'Christopher Lee'), ('Richard Barlow', 'Dennis Lotis'), ('Elizabeth Selwyn / Mrs. Newless', 'Patricia Jessel')]
synopsis: A young coed (Nan Barlow) uses her winter vacation to research a paper on witchcraft in New England. Her professor recommends that she spend her time in a small village called Whitewood. He originally cam from that village so he also recommends she stay at the "Raven's Inn," run by a Mrs. Newlis. She gets to the village and notices some weird happenings, but things begin to happen in earnest when she finds herself "marked" for sacrifice by the undead coven of witches. It seems that the innkeeper is actually the undead spirit of Elizabeth Selwyn, and the "guests" at the inn are the other witches who have come to celebrate the sacrifice on Candalmas Eve. As one of them said when Nan walked away, "HE will be PLEASED."

title: Jonah Who Will Be 25 in the Year 2000
actors: [('Mathilde', 'Myriam Boyer'), ('Max', 'Jean-Luc Bideau'), ('Marie', 'Miou-Miou')]
synopsis: The European equivalent of "The Return of the Secaucus 7," this Swiss film looks at the lives of several men and women in their 30s as they confront the slim gains of the "revolutionary" sixties. Max, a dissatisfied copy editor; Myriam, a redhead into tantric sex; and Marie, a supermarket checker who gives unauthorized discounts to the elderly, search for renewed meaning on a communal farm. The title character, a six-year-old child, is the carrier of their hopes for the future.

title: Retroactive
actors: [('Frank', 'Jim Belushi'), ('Karen', 'Kylie Travis'), ('Rayanne', 'Shannon Whirry')]
synopsis: A psychiatrist makes multiple trips through time to save a woman that was murdered by her brutal husband.

title: Place in the Sun, A
actors: [('George Eastman', 'Montgomery Clift'), ('Angela Vickers', 'Elizabeth Taylor'), ('Alice Tripp', 'Shelley Winters')]
synopsis: An ambitious young man wins an heiress's heart but has to cope with his former girlfriend's pregnancy.

title: Jacob's Ladder
actors: [('Jacob Singer', 'Tim Robbins'), ('Jezebel', 'Elizabeth Peña'), ('Louis', 'Danny Aiello')]
synopsis: A traumatized Vietnam war veteran finds out that his post-war life isn't what he believes it to be when he's attacked by horned creatures in the subway and his dead son comes to visit him...

title: Empire Records
actors: [('Joe Reaves', 'Anthony LaPaglia'), ('Jane', 'Debi Mazar'), ('Rex Manning', 'Maxwell Caulfield')]
synopsis: The employees of an independent music store learn about each other as they try anything to stop the store being absorbed by a large chain.

title: Bamba, La
actors: [('Ritchie Valens', 'Lou Diamond Phillips'), ('Donna Ludwig', 'Danielle von Zerneck'), ('Rosie Morales', 'Elizabeth Peña')]
synopsis: Biographical story of the rise from nowhere of singer Ritchie Valens whose life was cut short by a plane crash.

title: Ladyhawke
actors: [('Phillipe Gaston', 'Matthew Broderick'), ('Captain Etienne Navarre', 'Rutger Hauer'), ("Isabeau d'Anjou", 'Michelle Pfeiffer')]
synopsis: Captain Etienne Navarre is a man on whose shoulders lies a cruel curse. Punished for loving each other, Navarre must become a wolf by night whilst his lover, Lady Isabeau, takes the form of a hawk by day. Together, with the thief Philippe Gaston, they must try to overthrow the corrupt Bishop and in doing so break the spell.

title: Lucas
actors: [('Lucas', 'Corey Haim'), ('Maggie', 'Kerri Green'), ('Cappie', 'Charlie Sheen')]
synopsis: A socially inept fourteen year old experiences heartbreak for the first time when his two best friends -- Cappie, an older-brother figure, and Maggie, the new girl with whom he is in love -- fall for each other.

title: High Fidelity
actors: [('Rob Gordon', 'John Cusack'), ('Laura', 'Iben Hjejle'), ('Dick', 'Todd Louiso')]
synopsis: When record store owner Rob Gordon gets dumped by his girlfriend, Laura, because he hasn't changed since they met, he revisits his top five breakups of all time in an attempt to figure out what went wrong. As Rob seeks out his former lovers to find out why they left, he keeps up his efforts to win Laura back.

title: Price of Glory
synopsis: Released

title: Price of Glory
synopsis: Released

title: Price of Glory
synopsis: Released

title: Road to El Dorado, The
actors: [('Miguel  (voice)', 'Kenneth Branagh'), ('Tulio (voice)', 'Kevin Kline'), ('Chel (voice)', 'Rosie Perez')]
synopsis: After a failed swindle, two con-men end up with a map to El Dorado, the fabled "city of gold," and an unintended trip to the New World.  Much to their surprise, the map does lead the pair to the mythical city, where the startled inhabitants promptly begin to worship them as gods.  The only question is, do they take the worshipful natives for all they're worth, or is there a bit more to El Dorado than riches?

title: Skulls, The
actors: [('Lucas "Luke" McNamara', 'Joshua Jackson'), ('Caleb Mandrake', 'Paul Walker'), ('Will Beckford', 'Hill Harper')]
synopsis: Luke's exultance at being selected for The Skulls (a secret society bred within the walls of a prominent Ivy League Campus) is soon overshadowed when he realises that all is 'not well in Wonderland'. For The Skulls is a breeding ground for the future powerful and elite. It's not only a far cry from his working class background, but it also hallows its own deep and dark secrets.

title: Autopsy (Macchie Solari)
actors: [('Simona Sana', 'Mimsy Farmer'), ('Father Paul Lenox', 'Barry Primus'), ('Edgar', 'Ray Lovelock')]
synopsis: A pathology med student and a priest team up to investigate a wave of suicides blamed on sun spots and discover a number of them to be actual murders.
